Everyday benefits
🎯

Goal-oriented app

Trying to lose fat? Eat a more nutrient dense diet? We’ll keep you on track.

🦄

Nutrient dense recipes

Enjoy +150 professional curated recipes fit for your goals or create your own.

🔄

Food equivalents

How much fruit can you have and stay under your carb limit? We’ll tell you.

⏰

Fasting timer

What you eat matters, but when you eat is also very important. Find a pattern that works for you.

🧠

Free expert consult

Nearly everyone has questions about nutrition so please have a chat with our PhD’s - they’re here to help!

🧪

Cutting-edge food scores

Nutrita’s food scores help you follow a ketogenic diet, eat nutrient dense and keep insulin low for health and longevity.

Don’t just take our word for it

While you are in isolation, avoid piling on weight or eating a nutrient poor diet.... now might be the best time to nourish your body. #beigefree https://t.co/KuZxAqAt18

— The Fat Controller 🟥 (@itsjillgardner) March 23, 2020

Awesome App...use it daily to balance my nutritional needs. https://t.co/zVRdMkBvhS

— _ErnieB (@8899Eb) March 18, 2020

I had been reading about Nutritia. Loved the insulin Index and keto scores. Wonderful app.

— 🦊 Alejandro Ricciulli (@Zwandro) March 18, 2020

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question…

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question…

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

Diet

Low-carb

Carnivore
40% carbs / 30% protein / 30% fat

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

Activity level

Sedentary
Desk job and little to no exercise
Lightly Active
Light exercise 1–3 days/week
Moderately Active
Moderate exercise 3–5 days/week
Very Active
Hard exercise 6–7 days/week
Extremely Active
Hard daily exercise and physical job or training

Waist

|
cm

How-To

Your waist is situated just after the top of your hip bone. If you don’t have a tape measure at home, use your earbuds cable and wrap your waist with it. Compare the lenght measured with a A4 paper sheet. A A4 measures 21.0 × 29.7 centimeters.

Recipe title

This is recipe heaven for those who don’t like to cook. Healthy easy avocado boats filled with tuna mayo, prawn cocktail or a baked egg with bacon bits. Keto, Paleo low-carb heaven.

8 mn.

Prep time

10 mn.

Cook time

Ingredients

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin load Moderate

      7/10
    •

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

Recipe

Step 1
Mix the tuna and mayonnaise and any spices you like, add to the centre of the avocado boat.
Step 2
Sprinkle with salt and cracked pepper.
Step 3
Crack an egg into the hollowed out centre of the avocado. Bake at 180C/350F for 10 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your preference.

Help

How invitations work

Every time a new Nutrita Premium user signs up with your invitation code, they'll get a discount on their first trip (value amounts vary by location).

Once they start their first month of premium subscription, you'll automatically get $US 5 off your next subscription payment.

Discounts register automatically and expire 90 days from their issue date.

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

How does it work?

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

Learn with our in-house food scores

Learn with our in-house food scores

We used clinical data and our biochemistry expertise to create 3 scores: the insulin score tells you how a food affects the hormone insulin, the keto score tells you what’s keto and what’s not, and the nutrient density score tells you how nourishing a particular food or recipe truly is.

Built by scientists and engineers

Built by scientists and engineers

Supported by doctors 👩‍⚕️👨‍⚕️.

  •

Sarah Neidler (MSc, PhD)

Sarah did her PhD in cancer research at the Beatson Institute for Cancer Research in Glasgow.

She has a strong interest in nutrition and the ketogenic diet and believes that they are beneficial for the treatment and prevention of chronic conditions, such as heart disease and diabetes.

She loves cooking, reading, sewing, Yoga, and CrossFit.

Raphael Sirtoli (MSc, PhD cand.)

Raphael Sirtoli has an MSc in Molecular Biology and is a PhD candidate in Neuroscience at the Behavioral n’ Molecular Lab in Portugal.

His understanding of metabolism, nutrition and clinical medicine is the base from which Nutrita’s knowledge derives.

He loves open scientific debate, Crossfit, football, hiking and cold water immersion.

Dominic D’Agostino (PhD)

Dominic is a tenured Associate Professor at the USF Morsani College of Medicine and a research scientist at IHMC.

He seeks to educate scientists, clinicians and the lay public on metabolic-based research to advance the treatment and prevention of disease.

He’s a talented and tireless public advocate of good science.

Jacqui Van Kemenade (MD)

Jacqui is a general medical practitioner (GP) since 2002 and co-owns a private practice.

She’s a consultant GP specializing in diabetes who performs root cause analyses for her patients chronic health conditions.

She’s a passionate science communicator who focuses on the relationship between nutrition and chronic disease.

Gabor Erdosi (MSc)

Gabor Erdosi has a Master’s in Molecular Biology, extensive experience in biotech industries and founded the highly reputed Lower Insulin Facebook curating discussions about health and metabolism.

Gabor is also Nutrita’s podcast co-host called the BreakNutrition show, where he and Raphael Sirtoli have reviewed nutrition science papers.

Knowledge is power and we want it to empower all our users, which is why all of our scientific content is available for free. All of it is medically reviewed by the doctors on our board of advisors. Our team produces the highest quality scientific content on health and nutrition because of its wide range of expertise, covering medicine, scientific research, computer learning, science communication and design.

The Service offers health, fitness and nutritional information and is designed for educational purposes only. You should not rely on this information as a substitute for, nor does it replace, professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. If you have any concerns or questions about your health, you should always consult with a physician or other health-care professional. Do not disregard, avoid or delay obtaining medical or health related advice from your health-care professional because of something you may have read on the Service. The use of any information provided on the Service is solely at your own risk.
